title: Owning the Dash: The No-Regrets Retirement Roadmap
description: Ready to retire? It's a complicated question, involving your vision, values, and financial reality—one author and financial advisor Anthony Delauney is prepared to help you answer.In The No-Regrets Retirement Roadmap, Delauney guides you through making the most important decisions of your mature life, including defining your retirement dreams, establishing a flexible budget, getting the most out of Social Security, minimizing taxes, protecting your health and investments, and living with no regrets!Handy charts and checklists take you through the process step by step, making even the scariest questions— What if major home or health expenses arise after I retire? What insurance and investment strategies fit my needs? Do I really have enough money?—easy to approach and answer. Whether you’re driving this road alone or with a partner, confident in your assets or worried they won’t last, let Anthony Delauney navigate you to a happy, fulfilled retirement.
author: Anthony C. Delauney
